title: Hotline Edition: Dating in a Post Moon Landing World with Comedian Joyelle Johnson
description:
It’s another hotline and this week, Maria is joined by her friend and comedian Joyelle Johnson! Follow Joyelle on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/joyellenicole/


If you want to ask Maria a question on an upcoming hotline, be sure to follow her on Instagram to know when she’ll be going live: http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 


Questions this week include…

  • How do you stay hopeful when you have bad dating moments?
  • Should I ask “what are you looking for?” when you first meet someone? When is the time to ask it?
  • I keep finding unavailable men. How do I change that?
  • I want to date someone who is going through a divorce. How do I do that?


Want to work with Maria? Book a Dating Strategy call with a member of her team and learn more about her matchmaking and coaching programs. https://calendly.com/felix-louie


Want to join Maria on her next retreat? #Escape2Paros 2023 registration is officially open. http://agapeescapes.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
